After Marrying Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh Wants To Become ‘Husband Of The Millennium’
After Marrying Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh Wants To Become ‘Husband Of The Millennium’
With an ever-charming as well as eccentric personality, Ranveer Singh is undoubtedly people’s person. Wherever he goes, he has an irrepressible energy and a happy vibe that he sends across to people. He makes sure his fans, paparazzi, friend and family burst out laughing with his crazy antics and have a good time.
AFP
Did you know he was tagged as the “boyfriend of the millennium”! He has supported Deepika Padukone at every step. Forgetting her past and letting bygones be bygones, Ranveer doesn’t even mind hanging out with her former boyfriend Ranbir Kapoor. He, for sure, redefines goals.
Now that Ranveer Singh is married to the love of his life, Deepika Padukone, he says, he wants to be the “husband of the millennium”.
“I have achieved the title of 'boyfriend of the millennium'. Now I am working towards being the 'husband of the millennium',” he said.
Furthermore, he also revealed that Deepika’s first reaction after watching her in Simmba was, “Hot lag Raha hai (It looks hot).”
“Rohit sir had shown her a few rushes. She doesn't overreact on anything in life. So when the screen was off, she looked at me and said, 'Hot lagRahaa hai'," he added.
(Also read:'Bhabhi Mat Bulao Na', Deepika Padukone Blushes As She Requests Paparazzi To Not Call Her That!)
Isn’t he the perfect husband already? Well, at his wedding reception party, he also shared the mantra to a happy married life, watch the video below.

What does Deepika have to say about her husband Ranveer? Well, she is totally gushing over him.
“He is vulnerable, extremely emotional, very intelligent; childlike at times. That’s not to say that his irrepressible energy isn’t him, it’s very him. He’s a real people’s person, but there’s a quiet side to him too,” she said.
Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh, we wish you a lifetime full of happiness together!
